title: Large-Scale Deepened Understanding of Genetics Concepts via Flipped Learning and Digital Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Biology and Genetics Terminology, with Fundamental Knowledge of Pedagogy
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service/in-service teachers to practice effective methods of teaching genetics concepts, operating interactive classes using digital devices and game platforms like Kahoot

learning_goals: Learners can explain core genetics concepts (inheritance laws, gene expression, Mendelian genetics, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete over 90% of pre-learning materials through flipped learning design and participate in discussions/problem-solving during class
Learners can solve over 75% of peer-assessment and concept-application problems using digital game-based learning (Kahoot, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
